Description: A identifier or an accession number provided by a repository. This SHOULD be locally unique.
A concise name given to the investigation.
A textual description of the investigation.
The date on which the investigation was reported to the repository.
The date on which the investigation was released publicly.
A list of Publications relating to the study.
A list of Contacts relating to the study.
A classifier of the study based on the overall experimental design, e.g cross-over design or parallel group design.

The name of one factor used in the Study and/or Assay files. A factor corresponds to an independent variable manipulated by the experimentalist with the intention to affect biological systems in a way that can be measured by an assay. The value of a factor is given in the Study or Assay file, accordingly.
An classification of this factor into categories.
